scriptmanager.util

Class GenomeSizeReference

  • java.lang.Object
    • scriptmanager.util.GenomeSizeReference

  • public class GenomeSizeReference
extends java.lang.Object
    Create a genomic chromosome/contig size reference that is essentially defined as an ArrayList chromsome/contig names and a parallel ArrayList storing each chromsome/contig's length (in bp). Total bp genome length and genome name are also tracked and this class includes helper methods for generating random coordinates.
    Author:
    William KM Lai
    See Also:
    RandomCoordinate, TileGenome

    • Constructor Detail

      • GenomeSizeReference

        public GenomeSizeReference()
        Constructor for empty GenomeSizeReference object. I.e., empty chromName & chromSize lists with genomeSize set to 0 and genomeName as an empty Sstring.

    • Method Detail

      • setGenome

        public void setGenome(java.lang.String build)
               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Initialize genome build to a predefined set of chromosome/contig sets.
        Parameters:
        build - this string determines which genome build to use (see initialize_...() methods)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when unrecognized build String is input, this exception is thrown

      • getGenome

        public java.lang.String getGenome()
        Retrieve the name of the current genome build used in this GenomeSizeReference instance
        Returns:
        a String describing the current genome build (e.g. sacCer3, hg19_contigs, ...)

      • getGenomeSize

        public long getGenomeSize()
        Retrieve the total genome size of this GenomeSizeReference instance.
        Returns:
        genomeSize which should be equivalent to sum of all Longs in chromSize

      • getChrom

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getChrom()
        Retrieve list of chromosome names (chromName, parallel to chromSize).
        Returns:
        list of chromosome names (Strings)

      • getChromSize

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Long> getChromSize()
        Retrieve list of chromosome lengths in bp (chromSize, parallel to chromName).
        Returns:
        list of bp lengths (Long)

      • initialize_sacCer3

        public static void initialize_sacCer3()
        Set instance to use sacCer3 (yeast) genome build using the *roman* numeral chromosome naming system. This includes the "complete" assembled chromosomes, the mitochondrial chromosome ("chrM"), and the 2-micron plasmid. https://hgdownload.soe.ucsc.edu/goldenPath/sacCer3/bigZips/sacCer3.chrom.sizes

      • initialize_sacCer3_cegr

        public static void initialize_sacCer3_cegr()
        Set instance to use sacCer3 (yeast) genome build using the *arabic* numeral chromosome naming system. This includes the "complete" assembled chromosomes, the mitochondrial chromosome ("chrM"), and the 2-micron plasmid. https://hgdownload.soe.ucsc.edu/goldenPath/sacCer3/bigZips/sacCer3.chrom.sizes

      • initialize_hg19

        public static void initialize_hg19()
        Set instance to use hg19 (human) genome build. This includes only the "complete" assembled chromosomes. Excludes the mitochondrial chromosome and alternative contigs. https://hgdownload.soe.ucsc.edu/goldenPath/hg19/bigZips/hg19.chrom.sizes

      • initialize_hg19_contig

        public static void initialize_hg19_contig()
        Set instance to use hg19 (human) genome build. This includes the "complete" assembled chromosomes, the mitochondrial chromosome ("chrM"), and the full set of alternative contigs. https://hgdownload.soe.ucsc.edu/goldenPath/hg19/bigZips/hg19.chrom.sizes

      • initialize_hg38

        public static void initialize_hg38()
        Set instance to use hg38/GrCh38 (human) genome build. This includes only the "complete" assembled chromosomes. Excludes the mitochondrial chromosome and alternative contigs. https://github.com/igvteam/igv/blob/master/genomes/sizes/hg38.chrom.sizes

      • initialize_hg38_contig

        public static void initialize_hg38_contig()
        Set instance to use hg38/GrCh38 (human) genome build. This includes the "complete" assembled chromosomes, the mitochondrial chromosome ("chrM"), and the full set of alternative contigs. https://github.com/igvteam/igv/blob/master/genomes/sizes/hg38.chrom.sizes

      • initialize_mm10

        public static void initialize_mm10()
        Set instance to use mm10 (mouse) genome build. This includes only the "complete" assembled chromosomes. Excludes the mitochondrial chromosome and alternative contigs. https://hgdownload.soe.ucsc.edu/goldenPath/mm10/bigZips/mm10.chrom.sizes

      • generateRandomCoord

        public GenericCoord generateRandomCoord(int WINDOW)
        Generates a random coordinate of a specified interval length and random direction uniformly sampling from genomeSize
        Parameters:
        WINDOW - window size (interval length) of returned coordinate interval
        Returns:
        random coordinate interval with chr, start, stop, and direction

      • isSmaller

        public boolean isSmaller(int WINDOW)
        Check to make sure WINDOW size is smaller than every chromosome to prevent infinite loop.
        Parameters:
        WINDOW - the size of the window to check
        Returns:
        true if WINDOW is smaller than all chr, false if there is at least one chr smaller than WINDOW
